price: (2) A Messenger from Allāh, reciting purified[1959] scriptures
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
